mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.serial AS serial,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.type_id AS typeId,A.type_code AS typeCode,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.dict_code AS dictCode,A.cat_id AS catId,A.user_id AS userId,A.title AS title,A.pic_path AS picPath,A.local_pic_path AS localPicPath,A.oss_pic_path AS ossPicPath,A.link_path AS linkPath,A.album_id AS albumId,A.link_type AS linkType,A.link_id AS linkId,A.owner_id AS ownerId,A.owner_ids AS ownerIds,A.expiry_date AS expiryDate,A.is_cover AS isCover,A.is_main AS isMain,A.is_thumb AS isThumb,A.size AS size,A.ext AS ext,A.description AS description,A.content AS content,A.has_watermark AS hasWatermark,A.origin AS origin,A.scans AS scans,A.hits AS hits,A.attr_decimal AS attrDecimal,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.sequence AS sequence,A.remark AS remark,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy
,u.serial AS userSerial, u.username, u.real_name AS realName, s.name AS shopName, al.title AS albumName, d.dict_name AS typeName
LEFT JOIN dict d ON d.id = A.type_id LEFT JOIN album al ON al.id = A.album_id LEFT JOIN user u ON A.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN shop s ON s.user_id = u.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
